welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alabaster, where Southern charm meets modern city life. Known for its beautiful parks and friendly community, we invite you to explore our city and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport is primarily used by American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport is primarily used by Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport is primarily used by Southwest Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
